verses.roman:
bhāratī kahena,--tumi īśvara, antaryāmī
ye karāha, se kariba,--svatantra nahi āmi

synonyms: bhāratī kahena—Keśava Bhāratī replied; tumi—You; īśvara—the Supreme Personality of Godhead; antaryāmī—You know everything from within; ye—whatever; karāha—You cause to do; se—that; kariba—I must do; svatantra—independent; nahi—not; āmi—I.
translation: Keśava Bhāratī replied to the Lord, "You are the Supreme Personality of Godhead, the Supersoul. I must do whatever You cause me to do. I am not independent of You."
